channel.title: CodeWithAhsan
channel.description: The one stop shop to have fun with amazing people, and to code of course.

item.title: How to Build Programming Logic
item.description: How to build programming logic - 10 tips for beginners. Learn how to break down problems into smaller steps, use pseudocode, and test your code.
item.author: muhd.ahsanayaz@gmail.com (Muhammad Ahsan Ayaz)

item.title: The Complete TypeScript Setup - From Zero to Hero
item.description: Learn how to set up a TypeScript project with the best tools. From npm to ESLint and Jest, this guide offers a step-by-step tutorial for both new and experienced developers.
item.author: muhd.ahsanayaz@gmail.com (Muhammad Ahsan Ayaz)
